- Socket.IO for real-time updates

Add MongoDB Persistence to BotManager - Bots Survive Restarts!

MAJOR CHANGES:

1. BOT PERSISTENCE TO MONGODB:

   - persistBot() - Saves/updates bot to MongoDB

2. ALL MUTATIONS NOW PERSIST:
   - activateBot() â†’ async, saves to DB
   - pauseBot() â†’ async, saves to DB
   - retireBot() â†’ async, saves to DB
   - absorbBot() â†’ async, saves to DB
   - updateFingerprint() â†’ async, saves to DB
   - updatePerformance() â†’ async, saves to DB
   - registerBot() â†’ fire-and-forget persist

3. WHAT SURVIVES SERVER RESTARTS:
   - Bot configurations and status
   - Bot performance metrics
   - Bot fingerprints
   - User-created and absorbed bots

BEFORE: All bots lost on server restart (in-memory only)
AFTER: Bots persist to MongoDB and reload on startup

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\Timeb\OneDrive\TIME" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
v10.0.0 - WebAuthn + OAuth Authentication

NEW FEATURES:
1. WebAuthn/Passkeys (webauthn_service.ts):
   - Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello support
   - Hardware security keys (YubiKey, Titan)
   - Challenge-response authentication
   - Counter tracking for replay protection

2. OAuth Social Login (oauth_service.ts):
   - Google Sign-In (OAuth 2.0)
   - GitHub Login (OAuth 2.0)
   - CSRF protection with state tokens
   - Account linking + auto-registration

3. New Auth Endpoints:
   - POST /auth/webauthn/register/begin
   - POST /auth/webauthn/register/complete
   - POST /auth/webauthn/login/begin
   - POST /auth/webauthn/login/complete
   - GET /auth/oauth/providers
   - GET /auth/oauth/:provider/authorize
   - GET /auth/oauth/:provider/callback

4. Schema Updates:
   - Added webauthnCredentials array to UserSchema
   - Added oauthProviders array to UserSchema

DOCUMENTATION:
- TIMEBEUNUS.md updated to v16.0.0
- COPILOT1.md updated to v10.0.0
